sentences.sentence: Symptomatic infections in horses are also rare and generally mild, but can cause neurologic disease, including fatal encephalomyelitis.
sentences.translation: 马的有症状感染很罕见，且症状通常较轻，但也可能会出现神经感染性疾病，包括致命的脑脊髓炎。

sentences.sentence: Objective to explore the surface molecule changes of the experimental autoimmune encephalomyelitis (EAE) rat brain vascular endothelial cells.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨实验性自身免疫性脑脊髓炎(eae)大鼠脑血管内皮细胞表面分子的改变。

sentences.sentence: Objective: to explore the role of vascular cell adhesion molecule-1 (VCAM-1) in the pathogenesis of experimental autoimmune encephalomyelitis (EAE).
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨血管细胞粘附分子- 1 (VCAM - 1)在实验性自身反应性脑脊髓炎(eae)致病中的作用。
